entry.title: I used to know this life of mine (I used to know your love)
entry.summary:
Author: thenyoumightaswellwrestleangels

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,507Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "Oh, no sugar in mine, please." It's a simple thing, really - a soft, little request hazing through the early morning towards him. But Jason feels, as he freezes with the spoon he's holding half in the sugar container, a bit like you've shot him in the chest."No sugar?" he echoes - like it must've been a mistake, like he must've heard you wrong."Yeaâ€¦" you confirm carefully. "Just cream."

  • and then you have to learn to know them a second time
  • yes this is abt jason coming back from the dead
